overview:
As Vice President of Operations, Richardâ€™s responsibilities focus upon delivering mobile solutions that aim to exceed customer expectations through innovative executions. He succeeds by aligning the customer’s requirements with the most effective mobile solutions and closely monitoring the customer deliverables and campaign performance until its successful conclusion.

Prior to joining Briabe Media, Richard had 20 years of experience within the telecommunications and digital media industries, holding positions in account management, business development, emerging markets, and market strategies.
